short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch email addresses from the current page and subsequent pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Email Extractor is a simple and efficient browser extension designed to extract email addresses from web pages. Key features include:

 - Automatic email extraction from visited pages.
 - Ability to exclude specific emails using a customizable list.
 - View extracted emails and manage them in a clean, user-friendly interface.
 - Copy all emails to your clipboard with a single click.
 - Clear the email list whenever needed.

Perfect for marketers, researchers, and anyone looking to streamline email collection tasks
